title: Zeek - Network Protocols (NTP, SNMP, SSL, Kerberos)
description: - This dashboard gives insights into network protocols such as NTP, SNMP, SSH and Kerberos.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard gives insights into network protocols such as NTP, SNMP, SSH and Kerberos.

## Widgets
1. NTP versions
2. Top 10 NTP Modes
3. NTP stratum levels
4. NTP Log Details
5. Timeline for SNMP Activities
6. SNMP Log Details
7. Successfully Established Sessions
8. Failed Established Sessions
9. TLS Versions
10. Top 10 TLS Version and Protocol Used
11. Top 10 Handshake Alerts
12. Top 10 Validation Messages
13. Top 10 SSL Packet Orders
14. Top 10 Requested Server Names
15. Top 10 Ciphers
16. Top Certificate Subjects
17. SSL Log Details
18. Failed Requests
19. Error Occurred
20. Request Types
21. Forwardable Tickets
22. Renewable Tickets
23. Top 10 Clients
24. Top 10 Originators
25. Top 10 Responders
26. Top 10 Ticket Encryption Types
27. Top 10 Service
28. Kerberos Log Details

definition.title: Top 10 TLS Version and Protocol Used
